titleStmt.title: Albion's blessing a poem panegyrical on His Sacred Majesty, King William the III, and on his happy return, and the publishing the late glorious peace / written by Mr. D'Urfey.
titleStmt.author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Onley for Robert Battersby ... and Thomas Cater ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Forster Collection, Victoria and Albert Museum.
